transcription_link: Academic Studies Press - Interview - 2025/10/10 12:46 EEST - Notes by Gemini
email_content:
Hello Alessandra üëã,

I wanted to inform you that Evelina will be leaving this project, as she's decided to focus on other opportunities. Her last working day will be October 14th üíº.

To ensure a smooth handover, we'll provide two potential replacements. You'll have one week free of charge to work with both candidates and decide who's the best fit for your team ‚úÖ. Evelina will also assist with the transition process to make it as seamless as possible.

Please note that all terms and conditions of our existing annual agreement remain unchanged ü§ù.

Would it be convenient to have a short call tomorrow or on Friday at 12:00 or 1:00 PM your time to discuss the transition and next steps? üí¨

Looking forward to hearing from you ‚ú®

Best regards,
